**精灵阔剑**（elven broadsword）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它是一种单手[近战](/index.php?title=%E8%BF%91%E6%88%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "近战 (page does not exist)")武器，使用[阔剑](/wiki/%E9%98%94%E5%89%91 "阔剑")技能，且和其他[精灵族武器](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E6%97%8F%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵族物品 (page does not exist)")一样用[木头](/index.php?title=%E6%9C%A8%E5%A4%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "木头 (page does not exist)")制成。未鉴定时，它的外观为**[符文阔剑](/wiki/%E7%AC%A6%E6%96%87%E9%98%94%E5%89%91 "符文阔剑")**（runed broadsword）。

[杀兽剑](/index.php?title=%E6%9D%80%E5%85%BD%E5%89%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "杀兽剑 (page does not exist)")是一种[神器](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器武器 (page does not exist)")类精灵阔剑。你可以通过将任意一把精灵阔剑[命名](/index.php?title=%E5%91%BD%E5%90%8D\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "命名 (page does not exist)")为“杀兽剑”来将其转化为杀兽剑。

## 生成

精灵阔剑在随机生成武器中占0.4%。

所有非亡灵的[精灵](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E5%B1%9E%E6%80%A7%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（怪物属性） (page does not exist)")怪物生成时有1⁄3的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")精灵阔剑[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

## 策略

精灵阔剑在[双持武器](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8C%E6%8C%81%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "双持武器 (page does not exist)")时是不错的副武器选择，它对于小型怪物的平均伤害（6）甚至能够超过[长剑](/wiki/%E9%95%BF%E5%89%91 "长剑")（4.5）。不过，长剑对大型怪物的伤害（6.5）更好。

对于[混沌](/index.php?title=%E6%B7%B7%E6%B2%8C\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "混沌 (page does not exist)")阵营的玩家而言，通过命名精灵阔剑来制造杀兽剑可以增加首次[献祭赠礼](/index.php?title=%E7%8C%AE%E7%A5%AD%E8%B5%A0%E7%A4%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "献祭赠礼 (page does not exist)")中出现[兴风者](/index.php?title=%E5%85%B4%E9%A3%8E%E8%80%85\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兴风者 (page does not exist)")的概率，尤其是对[精灵](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（起始种族） (page does not exist)")族的[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师 (page does not exist)")和[游侠](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E4%BE%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游侠 (page does not exist)")而言。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[3.7.0](/wiki/3.7.0 "3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

[除魔之杖](/index.php?title=%E9%99%A4%E9%AD%94%E4%B9%8B%E6%9D%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "除魔之杖 (page does not exist)")现在是牧师的首选[献祭赠礼](/index.php?title=%E7%8C%AE%E7%A5%AD%E8%B5%A0%E7%A4%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "献祭赠礼 (page does not exist)")，因此制造[杀兽针](/index.php?title=%E6%9D%80%E5%85%BD%E9%92%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "杀兽针 (page does not exist)")和杀兽剑来提升兴风者出率的策略对牧师不再有用。

### 平均伤害计算

此处我们假设角色的[阔剑](/wiki/%E9%98%94%E5%89%91 "阔剑")技能为[熟练](/index.php?title=%E7%86%9F%E7%BB%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "熟练 (page does not exist)")（游戏中角色的最高阔剑技能等级），这会赋予伤害+1的加成。祝福的武器对[恶魔](/index.php?title=%E6%81%B6%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "恶魔 (page does not exist)")和[亡灵](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%A1%E7%81%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "亡灵 (page does not exist)")会额外造成1d4伤害。最坏的情况是攻击非亡灵且非恶魔的大型怪物。最好的情况是攻击小型的亡灵或恶魔。

| 武器        | 攻击普通小型怪物                                                                                              | 攻击普通大型怪物                                                                                    | 最坏情况                                                                                        | 最好情况                                                                                                                  |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 祝福的+0精灵阔剑 | ![\frac{1+6}{2}+\frac{1+4}{2}+1=\bold{7}](/images/math/3/c/a/3ca572aa3c3d25c2a71cce25aa2cf214.png)    | ![\frac{1+6}{2}+1+1=\bold{5.5}](/images/math/2/d/3/2d325d8b73b00186ac292d2053358f0a.png)    | ![\frac{1+6}{2}+1+1=\bold{5.5}](/images/math/2/d/3/2d325d8b73b00186ac292d2053358f0a.png)    | ![\frac{1+6}{2}+\frac{1+4}{2}+\frac{1+4}{2}+1=\bold{9.5}](/images/math/7/b/c/7bca7bdd4a2f40753ff8a1fda319475c.png)    |
| 祝福的+7精灵阔剑 | ![\frac{1+6}{2}+\frac{1+4}{2}+1+7=\bold{14}](/images/math/4/6/e/46efd043968db030e268b139d227f76b.png) | ![\frac{1+6}{2}+1+1+7=\bold{12.5}](/images/math/3/b/c/3bc379174d2871fab5dfc5ff3685c024.png) | ![\frac{1+6}{2}+1+1+7=\bold{12.5}](/images/math/3/b/c/3bc379174d2871fab5dfc5ff3685c024.png) | ![\frac{1+6}{2}+\frac{1+4}{2}+\frac{1+4}{2}+1+7=\bold{16.5}](/images/math/4/6/d/46d6d1e4b42ef4a2432195c6fe8cdcb9.png) |
| 祝福的+9精灵阔剑 | ![\frac{1+6}{2}+\frac{1+4}{2}+1+9=\bold{16}](/images/math/f/d/e/fde35cfb5ba35f5714d440044707d46e.png) | ![\frac{1+6}{2}+1+1+9=\bold{14.5}](/images/math/1/8/7/18742e0ba328c01464b3bf98a9238c3c.png) | ![\frac{1+6}{2}+1+1+9=\bold{14.5}](/images/math/1/8/7/18742e0ba328c01464b3bf98a9238c3c.png) | ![\frac{1+6}{2}+\frac{1+4}{2}+\frac{1+4}{2}+1+9=\bold{18.5}](/images/math/2/2/a/22a4a20ed85a9fca7e9fac594afedec2.png) |

## 历史

精灵阔剑最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Elven_broadsword/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") an elven broadsword will produce a normal [broadsword](/wiki/Broadsword "Broadsword"), and vice versa.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), the elven broadsword has a +2 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") bonus, deals 1d6+1d4 damage to small monsters and 1d6+2 to large monsters, and its weight is reduced to 20 [aum](/wiki/Aum "Aum").

The treasure piles in the [Grue's Cavern](/wiki/Grue%27s_Cavern "Grue's Cavern") will contain two elven broadswords: the one belonging to the dead [Elvenking](/wiki/Elvenking "Elvenking") or [Elvenqueen](/wiki/Elvenqueen_\(dNetHack\) "Elvenqueen (dNetHack)") will be enchanted and made of its default material, while the other is found within a [sack](/wiki/Sack "Sack") in the pile and will be made of [silver](/wiki/Silver "Silver").

dNetHack and notdNetHack also add a couple of artifact elven broadswords:

- [Glamdring](/wiki/Glamdring_\(dNetHack\) "Glamdring (dNetHack)") is a lawful elven broadsword that favors [Nobles](/wiki/Noble "Noble") and is the first sacrifice gift for [dwarven](/wiki/Dwarf_\(starting_race\) "Dwarf (starting race)") [Knights](/wiki/Knight "Knight"). It has +1d5 to-hit and deals +1d10 damage versus all monsters, along with dealing an additional +1d20 to [orcs](/wiki/Orc_\(monster_attribute\) "Orc (monster attribute)") and [demons](/wiki/MA_DEMON "MA DEMON") and [warning of both monster types](/wiki/Warned_of_monster_type "Warned of monster type") while wielded. Glamdring cannot be knocked out of the player character's hands while wielded.
- [The Rod of the Elvish Lords](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#The_Rod_of_the_Elvish_Lords "DNetHack artifacts") is a lawful [elven](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)") Noble-favoring artifact that can take the form of an elven broadsword, and engraves at the same quality as an [athame](/wiki/Athame "Athame") in this form.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), elven [sergeants](/wiki/Sergeant "Sergeant") and [lieutenants](/wiki/Lieutenant "Lieutenant") may generate with elven broadswords.

An elven broadsword can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a [scimitar](/wiki/Scimitar "Scimitar") with an [elven short sword](/wiki/Elven_short_sword "Elven short sword").

English

名称 精灵阔剑
外观 符文阔剑
伤害（小型） 1d6+1d4
伤害（大型） 1d6+1
命中修正 +0
武器技能类别 阔剑
规格 单手
基础价 10 zm
（+10/正数附魔等级）
重量 70
材料 木头

精灵阔剑（elven broadsword）是NetHack中的一种武器。它是一种单手近战武器，使用阔剑技能，且和其他精灵族武器一样用木头制成。未鉴定时，它的外观为符文阔剑（runed broadsword）。

杀兽剑是一种神器类精灵阔剑。你可以通过将任意一把精灵阔剑命名为“杀兽剑”来将其转化为杀兽剑。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 策略
    • 2.1 平均伤害计算
  • 3 历史
  • 4 Variants
    • 4.1 SLASH'EM
    • 4.2 dNetHack
    • 4.3 EvilHack
  • 5 引用及注释

生成

精灵阔剑在随机生成武器中占0.4%。

所有非亡灵的精灵怪物生成时有1⁄3的概率携带精灵阔剑[1]。

策略

精灵阔剑在双持武器时是不错的副武器选择，它对于小型怪物的平均伤害（6）甚至能够超过长剑（4.5）。不过，长剑对大型怪物的伤害（6.5）更好。

对于混沌阵营的玩家而言，通过命名精灵阔剑来制造杀兽剑可以增加首次献祭赠礼中出现兴风者的概率，尤其是对精灵族的牧师和游侠而言。

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

除魔之杖现在是牧师的首选献祭赠礼，因此制造杀兽针和杀兽剑来提升兴风者出率的策略对牧师不再有用。

平均伤害计算

此处我们假设角色的阔剑技能为熟练（游戏中角色的最高阔剑技能等级），这会赋予伤害+1的加成。祝福的武器对恶魔和亡灵会额外造成1d4伤害。最坏的情况是攻击非亡灵且非恶魔的大型怪物。最好的情况是攻击小型的亡灵或恶魔。

武器 攻击普通小型怪物 攻击普通大型怪物 最坏情况 最好情况
祝福的+0精灵阔剑
祝福的+7精灵阔剑
祝福的+9精灵阔剑

历史

精灵阔剑最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, upgrading an elven broadsword will produce a normal broadsword, and vice versa.

dNetHack

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, the elven broadsword has a +2 to-hit bonus, deals 1d6+1d4 damage to small monsters and 1d6+2 to large monsters, and its weight is reduced to 20 aum.

The treasure piles in the Grue's Cavern will contain two elven broadswords: the one belonging to the dead Elvenking or Elvenqueen will be enchanted and made of its default material, while the other is found within a sack in the pile and will be made of silver.

dNetHack and notdNetHack also add a couple of artifact elven broadswords:

  • Glamdring is a lawful elven broadsword that favors Nobles and is the first sacrifice gift for dwarven Knights. It has +1d5 to-hit and deals +1d10 damage versus all monsters, along with dealing an additional +1d20 to orcs and demons and warning of both monster types while wielded. Glamdring cannot be knocked out of the player character's hands while wielded.
  • The Rod of the Elvish Lords is a lawful elven Noble-favoring artifact that can take the form of an elven broadsword, and engraves at the same quality as an athame in this form.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, elven sergeants and lieutenants may generate with elven broadswords.

An elven broadsword can be created at a forge by combining a scimitar with an elven short sword.

对于[[混沌]]阵营的玩家而言，通过命名精灵阔剑来制造杀兽剑可以增加首次[[献祭赠礼]]中出现[[兴风者]]的概率，尤其是对[[精灵（起始种族）|精灵]]族的[[牧师]]和[[游侠]]而言。

{{upcoming/zh-CN|3.7.0|[[除魔之杖]]现在是牧师的首选[[献祭赠礼]]，因此制造[[杀兽针]]和杀兽剑来提升兴风者出率的策略对牧师不再有用。}}

=== 平均伤害计算 ===

== 历史 ==
精灵阔剑最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], [[upgrading]] an elven broadsword will produce a normal [[broadsword]], and vice versa.

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]], the elven broadsword has a +2 [[to-hit]] bonus, deals 1d6+1d4 damage to small monsters and 1d6+2 to large monsters, and its weight is reduced to 20 [[aum]].

The treasure piles in the [[Grue's Cavern]] will contain two elven broadswords: the one belonging to the dead [[Elvenking]] or [[Elvenqueen (dNetHack)|Elvenqueen]] will be enchanted and made of its default material, while the other is found within a [[sack]] in the pile and will be made of [[silver]].

dNetHack and notdNetHack also add a couple of artifact elven broadswords:

* [[Glamdring (dNetHack)|Glamdring]] is a lawful elven broadsword that favors [[Noble]]s and is the first sacrifice gift for [[Dwarf (starting race)|dwarven]] [[Knight]]s. It has +1d5 to-hit and deals +1d10 damage versus all monsters, along with dealing an additional +1d20 to [[Orc (monster attribute)|orcs]] and [[MA_DEMON|demons]] and [[Warned of monster type|warning of both monster types]] while wielded. Glamdring cannot be knocked out of the player character's hands while wielded.
* [[dNetHack artifacts#The Rod of the Elvish Lords|The Rod of the Elvish Lords]] is a lawful [[Elf (starting race)|elven]] Noble-favoring artifact that can take the form of an elven broadsword, and engraves at the same quality as an [[athame]] in this form.

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], elven [[sergeant]]s and [[lieutenant]]s may generate with elven broadswords.

An elven broadsword can be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining a [[scimitar]] with an [[elven short sword]].
